reporter-output.line: Feature File: RegisterToZingPoll.feature

Scenario: Register with empty new user

Then The SignUp form should be shown (undefined)
When I click Register button (undefined)
Then I verify the failure message "Please enter your name." (undefined)

And I verify the failure message "Please enter your password." (undefined)
And I verify the failure message "The re-type password is required and cannot be empty" (undefined)
And I verify the failure message "Please agree with the term!" (undefined)
